wikipedia_page.main: Tony Young (born 24 December 1952 in Urmston, Lancashire) is an English former footballer who made 181 appearances in the Football League playing as a full back for Manchester United, Charlton Athletic and York City.

response: * Tony Young (director) (1917–1966), British film director and television producer
* Tony Young (politician) (born 1966), San Diego city councillor
* Tony Young (actor) (1937–2002), American film and TV actor
* Tony Young (martial artist) (born 1962), African American martial artist
* Tony Young, Canadian television and radio personality, known as Master T
